data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Brentford get the game underway.
Steven Fletcher heads in to make it 1-0 at bet365 Stadium.
In the minute 35, Stoke take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to James McClean.
Ivan Toney (Brentford) gets a yellow card.
The first-half is over at bet365 Stadium.
In the minute 46, Keith Stroud blows to start the second-half. Stoke with the kick-off.
Bryan Mbeumo is on a sub for Saman Ghoddos for Brentford.
The away team have replaced Mads Bech with Mathias Jensen. This is the second substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
In the minute 59, Great finish from Tyrese Campbell to give Stoke a 3-0 lead.
Thomas Frank is making the team's third substitution at bet365 Stadium with Marcus Forss replacing Vitaly Janelt.
Marcus Forss puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 73, Michael O'Neill (Stoke) is making a first substitution, with Josh Tymon replacing Tyrese Campbell.
Steven Fletcher (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
Stoke make their second substitution with Sam Vokes replacing Steven Fletcher.
In the minute 87, Tashan Oakley-Boothe is replacing Jacob Brown for the home team.
Tashan Oakley-Boothe for Stoke has been booked by Keith Stroud and receives a first yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 3-2.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-2 through a strike by Marcus Forss. .
